MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 20-FEB-2021 23:59.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH54 postcode area of Livingston. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:09pm due to damaged electrical equipment on Mansefield Court and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:50pm on Saturday, 20 February 2021
